data.text:
Powers and Stats

Tier: 9-B

Name: Yoshie Kasuga, RoboGeisha Yoshie

Origin: RoboGeisha

Gender: Female

Age: Unknown

Classification: Robogeisha, mechanical maiko

Powers and Abilities: Superhuman Physical Characteristics, Martial Arts, Weapon Mastery, Enhanced Senses, Information Analysis, Transformation (can turn herself into a tank that can also run on walls), Can combine with Kikue into one ultra-powerful robogeisha

Attack Potency: Wall level

Speed: Supersonic (Dodged a deflected a few bullets with her arm)

Lifting Strength: Superhuman (Easily swings and throws her opponent with one hand)

Striking Strength: Wall level

Durability: Wall level

Stamina: Superhuman

Range: Extended Melee Range with hidden extended blades, Tens of Kilometres with her napalm blasts

Standard Equipment: Hidden extended sword blades from various points of her body, sword, napalm wig, shamisen with extended sword blade

Intelligence: Had hidden talent and potential who quickly became the head assassin

Weaknesses: Unknown

Feats:

Can already rip a phone book while in her base human form.

Easily dispatched other robot assassins like herself.

Notable Attacks/Techniques:

Wig Napalm: Shoots napalm blasts from her head.

Notable Matchups

Victories:

Losses:

Inconclusive:

Discussions
